data.description:
Connectd is a people-first platform connecting startups and scaleups with experienced fractional executives and strategic advisors. Using AI-powered insights and smart matching technology, we help ensure the right experts are placed with the right companies, so both sides can grow with confidence. In a world shaped by transformative technology, we provide a human-centred ecosystem where companies access the guidance they need to scale, and senior leaders find meaningful, flexible work that puts their experience to powerful use.

Since 2019, Connectd has facilitated over 10,000 connections across the UK and US, helping both sides of the ecosystem succeed: startups and scaleups gain trusted leadership at pivotal moments, and senior leaders and executives build dynamic, rewarding fractional careers.
data.description_enriched: Connectd is an investment platform and startup networking ecosystem that helps start-ups connect with investors and non-executive directors.
data.description_metadata_raw: Helping start-ups connect with investors and non-executive directors. Join Connectd today and gain access to the UK's best start-up investing platform.
categories_and_keywords: business and consumer services > marketing and advertising

company_locations_full.location_address: 3-4 Holborn Circus; London, EC1N 2HA, United Kingdom

company_updates.description:
Say hello to the new Connectd!

We’re powering the future of work by connecting visionary startups with fractional experts ready to break free and lead.

With AI powered search and a global community of 6,000+ members across 100+ industries, we’re building smarter leadership teams together.

The future is fractional. The future is Connectd.

Watch the launch and see what’s next.

#Connectd

Your dreams shouldn’t stay dreams. 

Stratiphy, part of our Connectd community, takes the complexity out of investing, making it simple, personal and stress-free.

Their new app guides your investments every step of the way and they’ve even been featured on CityAM.

#Startups #Connectd

Everyone’s got big dreams. 

We asked our team which startup they’d love a seat at the table for the one that resonates with them most.

Which company's board would you want to be on?

What’s tougher than breaking into a gatekept industry?

Breaking in without any connections.

Casey Stabile, founder of The Evergreen Exchange, didn’t have to. Through the Connectd platform, he tapped into senior execs who’d already been there and knew the way in.

It’s proof that the right people can open the right doors.

#Connectd

Filling senior talent gaps is one of the toughest challenges early-stage startups face.

Last week, our founder Roei Samuel, Head of Startups & Partnerships Clement Bigot and Alan Walsh (Head of Marketing at Tradeledger) joined the team at Antler to kick off our new partnership on their global partner platform.

We spoke with their portfolio founders about how fractional leaders and advisors can help plug those gaps, bringing expertise where it’s needed most, without the overhead.

Excited to support more Antler founders with access to our 3,500+ strong network of experienced professionals.

Big thanks to Darren Murphy, Richard Baillie, David Houghton and Jed Rose for having us.

#Connectd

Connectd is going all in during September and you’re invited!

This September, we’re hosting and sponsoring five standout events across the UK and US.

Whether you want to meet the Connectd team IRL, expand your network, or hear from leaders shaping the future of startups — we’ve got something for you.

Here’s what’s coming up:

📍 A Fractional Future: The Power of AI and DeepTech – 2nd September
↳ Our first-ever Manchester event featuring a panel on how founders and fractional leaders can leverage AI and Deeptech to drive growth.

📍 London Connectd Mixer – 9th September
↳ Our community networking night returns. Meet the team and the wider Connectd network for an evening of connection and conversation.

📍 New Jersey Panel – 10th September
↳ Bringing Connectd energy to New Jersey. Join us for cocktails and great conversations 🥂

📍 Tampa Connectd Mixer – 16th September
↳ Community networking night returns, connect with the team and peers.

📍 Empowering Neurodivergent Founders – 24th September
↳ We’re proud to co-sponsor Neuro Voices’ pitch event centered on neurodivergent founders; spotlighting funding, visibility and partner connections.

Whether you’re local or just passing through, don’t miss out.

Interested in attending one (or more) of our upcoming events? Click the link to reserve your spot 👉 https://lnkd.in/gW6mENS9

#Connectd #Events

Today’s the day ⏰

If you’ve ever felt the pressure of trying to do it all as a founder, this one’s for you.

At 5PM BST, our Head of Startups & Partnerships Clement Bigot is hosting a live webinar on how advisors help early-stage leaders avoid the classic pitfalls of scaling.

We’ll cover strategy, GTM, operational risks - plus a live Q&A.

Don’t miss it - free and open to all → https://lnkd.in/eipkax2J

#Connectd

What happens when the ladder you’ve been climbing starts disappearing?

Automation, remote work, and shifting company priorities are reshaping senior careers.

Roles that once felt secure are being redefined or removed entirely.

In this changing landscape, some are stepping back, while others are redesigning their careers entirely.

We explored how leaders are navigating this shift and building the next decade of their careers in our latest blog here → https://lnkd.in/eKuZ2WfF

#Connectd

Pay is where most people get fractional leadership wrong.

There’s a lot of misunderstanding around what these roles are really worth and the value they bring.

Here are 3 common myths, debunked, so you know exactly what to expect 👇

#Connectd

Sometimes the hardest thing to spot in your business… is your business.

Founders often struggle with clarity, not because they don’t know their product, but because they’re juggling different clients and solving problems.

That was Casey Stabile, founder of The Evergreen Exchange, until an advisor helped him step back, connect the dots and uncover the true value his business delivers.

#Connectd #Startups

Say hello to the new Connectd!

We’re powering the future of work by connecting visionary startups with fractional experts ready to break free and lead.

With AI powered search and a global community of 6,000+ members across 100+ industries, we’re building smarter leadership teams together.

The future is fractional. The future is Connectd.

Watch the launch and see what’s next.

#Connectd

Too many founders fall into the trap of thinking they need to do it all themselves.

Casey Stabile, founder of The Evergreen Exchange, grew faster by leaning on experienced advisors and fractional leaders who’d already navigated the challenges ahead.

Sometimes the smartest move isn’t pushing harder, it’s bringing in the right people.

#Connectd

Once seen as a “plan B,” fractional is now the career goal.

Our CEO, Roei, shared his perspective with T. Alexander Puutio in a recent Forbes article on why startups are chasing fractional talent and why professionals are actively choosing it as their future.

🔗 Full article here - https://lnkd.in/eV3gpbBM

Scaling without the right support? That’s when costly mistakes creep in.

On 2nd September, join our first panel event in Manchester as we explore how founders and fractional leaders can leverage AI and DeepTech to scale smarter.

Whether you’re a founder or a fractional advisor wanting to make an impact in the future of work, this is the perfect place to learn from industry leaders and build genuine connections.

Moderated by Henry Brysh, with insights from:

→ Luba Reynolds – Go-to-market strategy expert
→ Sam Hazeldine – COO & Co-founder, Great Wave AI
→ Sarah Schlobohm - AI and innovation expert

📆 2nd September
⏰ 6PM – 9PM BST
📍 Heron House

Be part of the conversation and connect with Manchester’s Connectd community → https://lu.ma/6ejgko3x 

#Connectd

Their new app guides your investments every step of the way and they’ve even been featured on CityAM.

#Connectd

We’re powering the future of work by connecting visionary startups with fractional experts ready to break free and lead.

The future is fractional. The future is Connectd.

Watch the launch and see what’s next.

#Connectd

You need to deinfluence yourself in believing you can wear all the hats to grow your business.

Burnout, stagnation, missteps; they all tend to show up when founders try to do it all without the right support.

Join us on 19th August at 5PM BST for an exclusive webinar hosted by Clement Bigot, Head of Startups and Partnerships at Connectd, on how strategic advisors can help you avoid common founder pitfalls.

What we’ll cover:

→ How experienced advisors sharpen direction and drive execution
→ Spotting operational risks before they become problems
→ Avoiding costly Go-To-Market mistakes
→ Why founders make better decisions with the right advisory board

Plus, stick around for a live Q&A to get your specific questions answered.

This one’s for early-stage leaders, CXOs and scaleup teams looking to scale their company without falling into avoidable traps.

Register your interest → https://lnkd.in/eipkax2J

#Connectd

London’s heating up and so is hospitality.

Terraces are packed, bookings are booming and venues need great people.

That’s where MONA Careers comes in - they connect trained actors with hospitality roles across London, bringing personality, professionalism and serious service.

Whether you’re hiring or job-hunting, check them out 👉 monacareers.co.uk

#Connectd

Fractional work isn’t going anywhere and startups need to leverage it.

But before you do, here is what you should know 👇

#Connectd

More startups and scaleups are turning to fractional experts but most don’t know how to get the most out of it.

Before you bring in a part-time CMO, CFO or advisor, here are 3 things every business should know.

From picking the right kind of support to making collaboration actually work - this quick guide will help you get real value from fractional leaders.

Swipe to see what works (and what doesn’t).

#Connectd

Real results start with a better journey

As more professionals build long-term portfolio careers, we’ve redesigned how we support them at every step.

Our Head of Customer Success, Jamie Morris, shares how we’re reshaping the journey to focus on what really drives outcomes, helping members form lasting relationships with startups and grow alongside them.

#Connectd #Fractional

Why is everyone talking about fractional right now?

Fractional leadership isn’t new but the way startups and scaleups are making use of it has definitely changed.

This shift isn’t happening in a vacuum. Economic uncertainty and rising costs have played a role, but so has the need for smarter, more flexible ways to access senior talent.

But this path isn’t for everyone.

You need to be:

↳ Highly adaptable 
↳ Intellectually curious 
↳ Confident working with ambiguity

So, how do you know if this could be for you?

Read the blog to see if fractional leadership is your next move 👇

https://lnkd.in/ebxAJWqu

#Connectd #Fractional #Startups

Great matches don’t happen by accident.

Behind every connection on Connectd is a smart mix of AI-driven matching and human insight, built to get founders the right support, fast.

Whether you’re scaling your startup or stepping into a board role, we make the process simple, intentional and built around you.

Here’s what our community has to say 👇

#Connectd

Where words divide, music unites.

Meet The Bridge, founded by Stephen Byrne (3 successful exits), building a movement that uses music to unite communities torn by conflict.

With Grammy-winning backing, 5M+ monthly views, and artists like Bob Geldof & Aurora behind them, they’re proving that storytelling and sound can heal where nothing else can.

🎙 Watch their story: https://lnkd.in/e2etuCKy
📄 Explore the deck: https://lnkd.in/erW8quAv 

If you believe in the power of music to create change, discover how you can be part of it.

#Connectd #Startups #Music

Capital opens the doors for business but expert talent builds what’s behind it

As more startups and scaleups scale leaner, faster and more strategically, we’ve evolved to match that shift.

Our Head of Startups & Partnerships, Clement Bigot, shares how we’re helping organisations find the right people, at the right time, to unlock real growth 👇 

#Connectd #Startups #Fractional

Say hello to the new Connectd!

We’re powering the future of work by connecting visionary startups with fractional experts ready to break free and lead.

With AI powered search and a global community of 6,000+ members across 100+ industries, we’re building smarter leadership teams together.

Watch the launch and see what’s next.

#Connectd

Big thanks to everyone from our Transition to Portfolio cohort who joined us last Wednesday for our Entrepreneurial Insights session with strategist Sara Marshall.

Sara shared sharp insights on what it really takes to build a successful fractional career and the kind of value startups are actually looking for.

Great to see the room so engaged and excited about what the future of fractional holds.

Want access to events like this?

Join the Connectd community: https://lnkd.in/epfJ4-zE 

#Connectd

Global payments shouldn’t work against SMEs.

Ellis Taylor LLM Law and the Glyde™ team have been quietly building a platform that lets businesses take control of cross-border payments:

↳ Set their own rates
↳ Automate workflows
↳ Avoid the usual FX pain points

With support from Connectd advisors (one even became an investor), they’re scaling fast and helping SMEs take back control.

Know a startup (maybe even yours) that could benefit from expert support to grow smarter? Talk to our team today: https://lnkd.in/eCYDCVFs

#Connectd #Fractional #Startups

We asked the team to describe our rebrand in just one word.

Let’s just say… not all of the answers were what we expected 👀

But that’s what makes this moment special. Everyone see’s something different in where we’re headed.

One brand. Many perspectives.

#Connectd

Claudia Stankler Clement Bigot Harriet Oliver William Smith Wyclef Kay Alexander Rose Luc Ebenezer Harvey Thomson Peter Dalrymple Tom Fitzsimons Nathaniel Opedo Jack Vale Annette Berry Roei Samuel Ruben Rai Nada B.

Thank you to everyone who’s followed, shared, or even quietly kept up with us.

We’re building a space where the future of work isn’t just talked about but it’s driven by a community of startups, scaleups and fractional experts.

As we grow, we’ll keep sharing:

↳ Stories from startups and experts in our network
↳ Fresh insights on fractional talent and scaling
↳ Highlights from the events shaping our community

And more to come.

Exciting times ahead and we’re glad you’re here for it.

#Connectd

What do startups really need from their advisors?

On Wednesday 9th July, 6–9PM, we’re hosting an exclusive event on Entrepreneurial Insights featuring business strategist Sara Marshall, available only to members on our Transition to Portfolio programme.

Having helped brands like Barclays, easyJet and Waitrose & Partners unlock meaningful growth, she’ll be diving into how to lay the foundations of a successful fractional career and what startups are actually looking for from experts today.

Want access to events like this and more?

Join the Connectd community here:
https://lnkd.in/eQSJFH4Y

#Connectd

The future of work is fractional and at Connectd, we’re ready to lead the charge.

As AI reshapes how we work, fractional careers are on the rise. More leaders are breaking free from traditional full-time roles to build flexible, impactful careers that truly fit their lives.

Connectd is purpose-built to empower fractional executives, board advisors, and non-executives to future-proof their careers and connect with startups & scale-ups across the globe.

Are you ready to embrace a fractional career?

#Connectd

Change doesn’t wait for permission.

It happens fast, unpredictable and sometimes uncomfortable.

Over the last year, we saw the signs:

↳ Experienced execs left on the sidelines when startups needed them most
↳ Thousands of jobs disappearing overnight
↳ AI moving faster than most companies can adapt

We knew staying the same wasn’t an option and in this clip, our CEO Roei shares the moment it became clear 👇

#Connectd #Fractional #Startups

Why rebrand when things are working? Because the future demands clarity and purpose.

At Connectd, we’ve evolved from connecting startups with investors to powering a global ecosystem where startups, fractional experts and board advisors thrive together.

Our new brand isn’t just a fresh look, it’s a statement about who we are and where we’re headed in a world reshaped by AI and shifting work dynamics.

Discover how we’re building a more human future of work 👇

#Connectd

The wait’s almost over.

This time tomorrow, we step into something new.

Something bold.

Something that feels more Connectd than ever.

Are you ready?

#Connectd

One of our favourite nights yet.

Yesterday at Google HQ, we brought together our Connectd community to talk about something that is shifting fast in this new future of work:

“The future of leadership and why it doesn’t always need to be full-time to drive real impact.”

Hearing from Roei Samuel on the founder’s view of building a strategic board, Brian Fitzpatrick on what it really means to go fractional, and Nancy Duncan on why creative thinking is a true business asset made the whole evening feel long overdue.

Massive thanks to Ruby Howard and Benjamin Zirah from the Google Cloud team for helping bring this to life and to everyone who joined us.

#Connectd

Aylin Abdullah Ali ✨ Stripling Alexander Rose Zain Noor Hidai Degani Presence P. Jamie Morris

The future of work is changing fast.

↳ Startups are scaling leaner.
↳ Executives are going fractional.
↳ Strategic leadership looks very different to five years ago.

At Connectd, we’ve evolved with the shift. We’ve refined what we offer to give you the edge with better tools, smarter connections and a growing global network.

Stay tuned.

Something even sharper is on its way.

#Connectd

Who says leadership has to be full-time to be high impact?

Just 4 days to go until The Future is Fractional, an exclusive event hosted by Google Cloud Partnerships for our Connectd members.

Our third and final panellist, Nancy Duncan, joins Roei Samuel and Brian Fitzpatrick. With 20+ years’ experience, Nancy is a creative strategist who helps brands, agencies, and startups cut through the noise.

From experience design to pitch consultancy, she offers sharp insights on how startups can blend creativity with commercial thinking to scale smarter, not harder.

🗓 June 30th, Monday
📍 Google HQ, 6 Pancras Square
⏰ 5PM–8PM

Want access to events like this?

Join the Connectd community today: https://lnkd.in/ezsH7sF6 

#Connectd

Fractional leadership is the secret weapon early-stage startups can’t afford to overlook.

Join us on June 11th, 6PM EDT at the CitizenM Hotel in Miami for an exclusive evening unpacking how fractional executives are driving growth, innovation and resilience in today’s fast-paced startup world.

Introducing our first panellist: Roei Samuel, Founder & CEO of Connectd. He’ll dive into why fractional talent is essential and share real-world examples of the impact these leaders make.

Don’t miss out and secure your spot now 👉 https://lu.ma/zof0ss4s

#AdvisoryBoard #PortfolioCareers #Connectd

If Huel, Nike & Fabletics trust them, it’s worth paying attention 👀

Wellnergy✨ is a UK startup combining fitness, mindfulness, music and technology through their flagship festival and AI-powered platform.

They also collaborated with wellness voices such as Grace Beverley - creating impact both online and in real life.

🎟️ Their Wellnergy Festival 2025 is just around the corner. So treat yourself to a wellness boost and kick off your summer right: https://wellnergy.com/ 

#Startup #Connectd #WellnergyFestival2025

We were in NYC this March and now we’re back for round two! 🗽

Join us Monday, June 2nd for an evening of meaningful networking with founders, advisors and the Connectd team to exchange ideas, explore collaborations and more.

Here’s what you need to know:

🗓 Monday, June 2
🕕 6PM–9PM EDT
📍 citizenM New York Times Square Hotel

Space is limited, so grab your spot now 👉 https://lu.ma/c8jssd26

At Connectd, we’ve seen how advisors can be the difference between treading water and scaling with confidence.

Here are 5 key ways top board advisors help startups grow faster and smarter 👇

We’ve done NYC, Miami, London - Tampa, you’re up 🥂

Our Connectd Mixer is heading south for a night of real conversations, meaningful connections and networking with founders, portfolio professionals and the Connectd team – including our CEO.

Here’s what you need to know:

🗓 Monday 2nd June

🕕 6PM–9PM EDT

📍 M. Bird, Tampa, Florida

Spots are limited – secure yours now 👉 https://lnkd.in/eq2FEbY2 

#Connectd #Events

Solving a problem you didn’t even know existed. 

Mistify AI Technologies Pvt Ltd is a UK clean-tech startup tackling the hidden dangers of construction dust using smart AI tech.

Their system optimises dust suppression in real time - protecting workers and communities from harmful particles that too often go unnoticed.

While still an MVP, Mistify AI is already paving the way for a cleaner, safer future in construction.

Keep a close eye on them as they grow as this is just the beginning ✨

#Startup #Connectd

Exciting news for our US Connectd Community - we’re coming 🇺🇸

This June, we’re hosting and sponsoring five standout events across NYC and Florida.

Whether you want to meet our Connectd team IRL, grow your network, or hear insights from startup leaders - we’ve got something for you.

Here’s what’s coming up:

📍 NYC Connectd Mixer – 2nd June
↳ Our community networking night returns. Meet our team, our CEO and other founders and advisors in the Connectd network.

📍 SaaS & AI Happy Hour (NYTechWeek) – 3rd June
↳ We’re co-sponsoring this rooftop mixer with NachoNacho. A perfect #NYTechWeek kickoff.

📍 Tampa Connectd Mixer – 9th June
↳ Bringing our Connectd energy to Florida. Join us for an evening of great convos and cocktails 🥂

📍 Fort Lauderdale Tech Meetup – 10th June
↳ Enjoy an evening of networking and an exclusive panel event with the South Florida tech community. Our members can use ‘CONNECTDJUNE’ at checkout for a free ticket.

📍 Miami Panel & Mixer – 11th June
↳ Our CEO Roei Samuel is joining a panel of industry leaders to explore startup growth in 2025 and beyond.

Whether you’re local or just passing through, you wouldn’t want to miss out.

Interested in attending one (or more) of our upcoming events? Click the link to reserve your spot 👉 https://lnkd.in/gW6mENS9 

#Connectd #Events #Startups #AdvisoryBoard

What happens when you ask 850 people to pitch their dream with zero prep?

In under 60 seconds, 
the whole room shifted.

Cordell Jeffers reminded us that your starting point isn’t your final one.

Amelia Sordell 🔥 said what most won’t build your brand, stop waiting for permission.

Simon Squibb gave away £10K to help Daisy get to the next level in her shoe business.

Hajar J. Woodland closed with a stand-up that had me missing my own days on stage.

And the HelpBnk team?They’ve helped 240,000 people and counting — and now they’re partnering with Richard Branson and Virgin.

That’s what happens when you build with heart, focusing on giving without receiving.

When it was my turn on stage, 
I dropped the script and asked:
“Who here has a dream they want to pitch?”

Hands went up and the room got loud. 

Kate Whitley stood up. 

She shared how her pain led her to build something powerful for the neurodiverse community.

Raw. Brave. Real.

Here’s what I told the founders in the room:

– You don’t need to go full-time to make full-time impact.
– You don’t need to build alone to prove you’re capable.
– You don’t need it all figured out to start.We need more rooms like that.

More hands in the air.
More people starting messy.

If you were there, what moment stuck with you? 

If you weren’t, what dream would you pitch if you had 60 seconds and no slides?

Drop it in the comments. 
Let’s keep this energy moving.

P.s thank you Zain Noor Claudia Stankler Harriet Oliver Emily Brooke @Ally hutson Presence P. Jim Dixon Tom Bromley-Davenport, @Elliot Alexander Rose for coming along,

and the HelpBnk team Adrien Hastert Kim Richardson, Simon Howard  Adam Smith for the event.

Exciting news for our Connectd startup community!

Get ready for Google for Startups’ latest ‘Startup Social: Agentic AI’ training programme - packed with fresh content to help startups implement and scale AI agents across their teams.

Founders will learn how to use Google’s pre-trained APIs, get expert guidance from Google Cloud AI specialists, and discover practical strategies to accelerate growth.

Sessions kick off on June 10th - register now to secure your spot👉 https://lnkd.in/efF-9Tk4

Want to leverage AI to outpace your competitors?

Connectd, in collaboration with Dell Technologies, is hosting an exclusive evening on how founders can put AI to work inside their startups.

You’ll hear from a panel made up of:

⚪️ Roei Samuel, CEO and Founder of Connectd
⚪️ Peyman Mestchian, Advisory Board Member at Quantexa and UCL Professor
⚪️ Elliott Young, CTO at Dell Technologies EMEA

They’ll break down everything from how to spot AI opportunities inside your startup, to practical steps to get started with AI implementation and how to leverage AI for growth and scale.

Here’s what you need to know:

📅 Date: Thursday, 8th May 2025
⏰ Time: 5PM - 8PM BST
📍 Location: Barclays Bank, Moorgate, London

🎁 Plus, stand a chance to win a Dell 14 Portable Monitor when you attend!

Secure your spot now 👉 https://lu.ma/h4mxcgnl

Early-stage founders can’t do it alone, and the right advisors help them see what they can’t.

John Wright, a mentor and board advisor, knows firsthand how founders operate. The passion, the late nights, the constant problem-solving - it’s all-consuming.

But that intensity can also cause them to overlook the blind spots. That’s where experienced advisors step in.

Having the right people in place from the start gives founders the clarity they need to make smarter decisions.

Want to know how you can be the right person to guide early-stage companies? Learn more about how our ‘Transition to Portfolio’ programme can help: https://lnkd.in/gzbb28Aw
